MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB700200923
Licensee Name: Adoption Associates Inc
Licensee Address: 1338 Baldwin
Jenison, MI 49428
Licensee Telephone #: (616) 667-0677
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Michelle Dykema, Designee
Name of Facility: Adoption Associates, Inc
Facility Address: 1338 Baldwin Street
Jenison, MI 49428-8937
Facility Telephone #: (616) 667-0677
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency has requested approval to include a satellite office located at
115 S. Main Street, 2B, Freeland, MI 48623 - Suite 2B.
III. Methodology
The on-site inspection of the new space was completed on 08/16/2018.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The office space was observed and consisted of a lobby, two employee offices,
one large multi-purpose room dedicated for visitation, meeting and training as well
as a bathroom, kitchenette and space for storage. The office had locked storage
available for confidential information and a crosscut shredder for disposal of
confidential information, including CHRI. The space is suitable for the purposes of
the agency. It is expected that the agency will provide supervision on-site, at least
2 days per week, as required in the CPA licensing rules.
V. Recommendation
I recommend that the satellite office be approved for use under this license.
August 17, 2018
________________________________________
Jessica VandenHeuvel Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved by:
August 27, 2018
________________________________________
Claudia Triestram Date
Area Manager
2
